name: LOVE is the Resistance
description:
LOVE is the Resistance

R is for Resistance and is the letter that starts the game.  Our SuperHero jumps off his bed to catch enough LOVE to dive bomb the monster in his closet.  Left and right movement either with arrow keys or W A S D and click if you want to jump to catch more love.

The game win is on a timer and set to 42 hearts.  How much LOVE does it take to transform the monster ?
